website_summaries.verdict: Approach aficionados who are in need of an incredibly comfortable shoe—one with matching looks to boot—are more than welcome to check out the Wildfire Edge Mid GTX. Hikers who are desperate for something intensely sticky and supportive can also bank on this product.All that said, slipping one’s foot into this shoe might not be the best experience. Nonetheless, the Wildfire Edge Mid GTX is remarkable in both function and form.
pros: When it comes to comfort, many reviewers find the Salewa Wildfire Edge Mid GTX phenomenal
This high-quality approach shoe has an A-grade support system, according to numerous wearers
Based on several reports, the Wildfire Edge Mid GTX is fantastically pleasing aesthetically
Its ability to dig into most types of surfaces and provide a grippy ride is quite convincing, some testers claim
Less than a handful of customers are deeply impressed with the Wildfire Edge Mid GTX’s craftsmanship
It does not demand too much when it comes to break-in period, a few patrons say
To a small group of consumers, this approach-centric hiker fences out moisture very well
cons: According to a decent number of owners, this approach-specific piece from Salewa is a challenge to put on and remove
This offering has a super-demanding asking price

customer_reviews.title: Love/hate "sock" collar
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the long-running Merrell Chameleon stetch shoes, the combo of hiking tread and ninja sock-like fit is awesome. The upper on these Salewa's promised to take this a step further by combining S's great fit technology with a completely dirt-blocking collar, but frustratingly they suck to get on and off. Just really miserable considering that the Merrell's are almost slip-ons. Something like a velcro'd gusset is desperately needed. Unfortunately I was so excited by the tread behavior that I wore them and can't return them now. I also wish they were all-synthetic like my older Firetails- these would make great jungle boots if only they were rot-proof. Really sad about that part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These have got to be the coolest shoes I've ever had. I love the style, breathability, lacing down to the toe, velcro sole system with extra soles included, the behind the heel lace system, and the really awesome elastic top that keeps out dirt, rocks, and sand. Super comfortable too. They're amazing for hiking and outdoors but I also wear mine daily. These and another pair of Salewas are all I wear now. Took sometime to come from the Netherlands but worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The boot fits as expected and is quite comfortable. Only issue is the left sole makes a “popping” sound after you take a step with it. Tried tightening the boot more and then loosening it to see if the issue would correct. It hasn’t yet but I have only worn them twice thus far in the few days of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely superb quality - Run one size small
customer_reviews.text: These really are extremely comfortable and durable. I never write amazon reviews but felt I needed to because I love these so much. With that said, like others have said, you absolutely SHOULD buy one size larger than your running shoe. They are slightly difficult to out in, but to me, that's great because they feel really solid when they're on. These are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Northridge

customer_reviews.title: Best boot I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing almost everyday for 10 hours at a time for almost a year. I have wide feet with high arches and finding the perfect boot has been a pain. This boot...perfect comfort. Best boot I've ever worn and tempted to buy another just in case they discontinue it. Don't get me wrong, it's still in fantastic condition, I just want one in case I can't find another.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn P. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots! Unbelievable comfort, incredibly stylish, and tough as nails. To top it off, I got these in 2 days of ordering them. I was very surprised and happy. I wish I could get the other available color to have both. Will definitely continue my relationship with Outland, USA.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Harris

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. At first I thought they were a little pricey, but these things were worth every penny. They are warm and they are actually waterproof. I run a lot and I wanted a boot that I could run in the snow and slush without getting my feet wet. Well....i found them lol. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking boot!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present for my son. They look amazing, but he will have to be the one to be the judge of how they fit, etc.
customer_reviews.author: synamin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a police officer and he loves them. Well worth the money, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: I like em
customer_reviews.text: They kinda rub against my feet and have left a lot of blisters but it’s because I run a lot. I do like them a lot tho, very warm and have great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Reece simpson

customer_reviews.title: Who The Heck Is Complaining So Much?
customer_reviews.text: About slipping them on or off due to the extra sock section? When I kept reading about it I got worried that I wouldn't like them, they'd be uncomfortable or incredibly hard to take off. None. Of. That. Je-Sus! Some of you love to whine about ANYTHING...The boots fit like a glove, it wasn't hard to take off or put on and they felt broken in from the beginning...Even had some room to put a hardcore work insert and they feel like heaven. With the warranty I feel quite happy that they'll be worth the price and put up with the abuse. Are there better boots? Probably but will they also be about $100-$200 dollars more? Yes.
customer_reviews.author: Noodles123

product_meta.title: Salewa Wildfire Edge GTX Mid Shoes Men Black/Black Shoe Size UK 8 | EU 42 2019
product_meta.description: The article Men's Wildfire Edge Mid GTX Shoes was produced by Salewa. The Shoe is suitable for men.
